ai.summary: A short, family-friendly woodland loop of about 3.3 km near Erddig in the UK. An easy-rated trail that runs on gentle forest paths, suitable for all ages and casual walkers.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat to gently undulating forest paths with compact soil and some exposed roots. Expect shaded sections, occasional damp patches after rain, and a few open clearings along the route.
ai.safety_notes: Wear sturdy shoes and dress for the weather. Stay on marked paths, watch for roots and uneven ground, and check rainfall beforehand. Carry water and a small snack. Be aware of wildlife and ticks in woodland areas; keep dogs under control where required. Plan for shorter daylight hours in winter.
recommended_gear: Map or fully charged phone with offline map
ai.best_seasons: All year round, with the best conditions in spring and autumn. The trail can be muddy in winter.

seo.title: Erddig Big Wood Trail - 3.3 km Easy Woodland Walk in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover a short 3.3 km easy woodland loop at Erddig. Family-friendly and suitable for casual walkers, with shaded paths and flat terrain.
